results.title: Soluble ICAM-1 secretion and its functional role as an autocrine growth factor in nasal NK/T cell lymphoma cells.
results.text_hl: We conclude that @CELLLINE_CVCL:F856 @@@NNKTL@@@ cells secrete sICAM-1 that acts as an autocrine factor for @DISEASE_Lymphoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008223 @@@lymphoma@@@ progression, and suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be a potential candidate to treat @<m>DISEASE_GATA2_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077428 @@@NNKTL@@@.

citations.NLM: Takahara M, Nagato T, Komabayashi Y, Yoshino K, Ueda S, Kishibe K, Harabuchi Y. Soluble ICAM-1 secretion and its functional role as an autocrine growth factor in nasal NK/T cell lymphoma cells. Exp Hematol. 2013 Aug;41(8):711-8. PMID: 23583640
